headline.main: Full Story' Monday About Pearl Harbor

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 1 -- The "full story" of what happened at Pearl Harbor will be revealed by the Office of War Information next Monday, first anniversary of that historic and tragic event, Secretary of the Navy Frank Knox stated today.
abstract: Pearl Harbor battle: Sec Knox promises full story
snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 1 -- The "full story" of what happened at Pearl Harbor will be revealed by the Office of War Information next Monday, first anniversary of that historic and tragic event, Secretary of the Navy Frank Knox stated today....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
